subject: Business
title: Combinatorial Innovation: Remixing Existing Ideas
description: Learn Combinatorial Innovation: Remixing Existing Ideas in one minute.

hook.text: The iPhone combined a phone, music player, and internet device. None were new. The combination was revolutionary.

buildup.text: Combinatorial innovation means combining existing technologies, ideas, or business models in new ways.

discovery.text: Edison didn't invent electricity, filaments, or vacuums. He combined them into the light bulb.

twist.text: As more technologies exist, the possible combinations grow exponentially. We're in a golden age of remixing.

climax.text: ChatGPT combined transformers, RLHF, and a chat interface. Each existed. The combination changed the world.

punchline.text: Most breakthroughs aren't invented. They're assembled from existing pieces.

quiz.question: What is combinatorial innovation?
options: Combining existing technologies or ideas in new ways
Using only one technology at a time
